ArgonTest.Name: Builder (trait)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
trait IntBuilder(self: type) <: Object public abstract def _.withValue(i: Int): self end
class IntStrBuilder <: IntBuilder IntStrBuilder
field i: Int field s: String
public new(intValue: Int)(strValue: String) field i = intValue field s = strValue initialize _ end
public override def _.withValue(j: Int): IntStrBuilder = IntStrBuilder.new j s
public def _.intValue: Int = i public def _.strValue: String = s
end
proc main(): () do let builder = IntStrBuilder.new 5 'Hello' let builder2 = builder.withValue 10
puts (builder2.intValue.to_s()) puts builder2.strValue end
